text: Himmelstadt is a community in Main-Spessart in the Regierungsbezirk of Lower Franconia (Unterfranken) in Bavaria, Germany and a member of the Verwaltungsgemeinschaft (Administrative Community) of Zellingen. Because of the community’s “heavenly” name – Himmel means “heaven” or “sky” in German – the Weihnachtspostamt Himmelstadt (“Himmelstadt Christmas Post Office”) has existed since 1986, run by Deutsche Post and the community. == Geography == === Location === Himmelstadt is in the Würzburg Region. The community has only one Gemarkung (traditional rural cadastral area), also called Himmelstadt. == References == == Other websites == * Himmelstadt Christmas Post Office Category:Main-Spessart
title: Himmelstadt
